title: Yellowjackets Finally Reveals the Antler Queen and Girl in the Pit in Season 3 Finale — Grade It!
description: So, were they who you thought they’d be? Yellowjackets‘ Season 3 finale, which began streaming Friday, finally brings the teens’ story to the point where we first met them: the hunt in the woods that kicked off the series’ premiere. (Take a walk down cannibalistic memory lane here.) From the way that sequence was shot, […]
author: Kimberly Roots

title: Seriously? Grey’s Anatomy Is Making Us Take Sides, and It Feels Like [Bleep]
description: Given that it’s Grey’s Anatomy’s messiest couple that we’re talking about, I guess we should’ve seen it coming. Of course Teddy and Owen managed to make a complete and total disaster of their open marriage in only a single episode (recapped here). Now we in the audience are left to take sides, and it’s hella […]
author: Charlie Mason

title: MobLand Season 1 Episode 3 Reveals When Plan A Involves War, You Can Guess What Plan B Looks Like
